newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Rio Tinto appoints two directors.
newsitem.headline: Rio Tinto appoints two directors.

text.p: Rio Tinto said on Tuesday it had appointed Glaxo Wellcome chairman and chief executive Richard Sykes and Abbey National chairman Lord Tugendhat as non-executive directors.
Sykes was appointed chairman and chief executive of Glaxo Wellcome in May. He also sits on government and scientific committees and is a trustee of the National History Museum in London.
Tugendhat is chairman of Blue Circle Industries and a non-executive director of Eurotunnel and was chairman of National Westminister Bank from 1990 to 1991.
The appointments follow the retirement of Richard Searby and David Simon in May, Bill Dix in September last year and the impending retirement of Gustav Nossal in September this year.
